name: V-Neck Tee
description: A classic and versatile V-neck tee, perfect for layering or wearing on its own. Available in a variety of colors.

name: Crewneck Tee
description: A comfortable and casual crewneck tee. Great for everyday wear or lounging. Available in a variety of colors.

name: Tank Top
description: A sleeveless tank top, perfect for warm weather. Available in a variety of colors and styles.

name: Blouse
description: A dressier top with a more tailored fit. Can be paired with slacks or a skirt for a polished look.

name: Sweatshirt
description: A comfortable and casual sweatshirt, perfect for cooler weather. Available in a variety of colors and styles.

name: Hoodie
description: A casual top with a hood, perfect for layering or wearing on its own. Available in a variety of colors and styles.

name: Crop Top
description: A shorter-length top that exposes the midriff. Available in a variety of styles, such as tank tops, t-shirts, and sweatshirts.

name: Camisole
description: A sleeveless top with a fitted silhouette, often worn as a layering piece.

name: Graphic Tee
description: A t-shirt with a graphic design or message on the front. Can be a fun way to express your personality.

name: Button-Down Shirt
description: A collared shirt with buttons down the front. Can be dressed up or down for various occasions.

name: Tunic Top
description: A longer-length top that falls at the hip or thigh. Can be worn on its own or with leggings.

name: Bodysuit
description: A close-fitting one-piece garment that snaps at the crotch. Often worn with jeans or skirts.

name: Tank Top Dress
description: A long tank top that can be worn as a dress. Perfect for summer weather.

name: Skinny Jeans
description: A close-fitting trouser that tapers down the leg. Available in a variety of washes and colors.

name: Straight-Leg Jeans
description: A classic jean with a straight leg opening from hip to ankle. Available in a variety of washes and colors.

name: Bootcut Jeans
description: A jean that flares out slightly from the knee down, designed to fit over boots. Available in a variety of washes and colors.

name: Wide-Leg Trousers
description: Trousers with a wide leg opening from hip to hem. Can be dressy or casual depending on the material.

name: Palazzo Pants
description: Wide-leg trousers with a flowing silhouette, often made from a light and airy fabric.

name: Leggings
description: A close-fitting stretchy garment that resembles tights but is thicker and more opaque. Can be worn on its own or layered under other clothing.

name: Ladies Printed Skirt - Black Printed
description: A short skirt that ends high on the thighs. Can be a fun and flirty piece for summer.

name: Ladies Printed Skirt - White Printed
description: A skirt that falls below the knee but above the ankle. A versatile length that can be dressed up or down.

name: Ladies Wrap Skirt W/Knot - Navy Printed
description: Ladies Wrap Skirt W/Knot - Navy Printed by Ayana. This Skirts is part of our stylish new collection. We have limited pieces available so get it now while stocks last. Please Note: Available colors may vary.

name: Ladies Office Skirt Mini - Grey
description: A straight, fitted skirt that reaches the knee. A classic workwear style that can also be dressed down for a casual look.

name: Ladies Long Skirt - Off White
description: A skirt that has a fitted waist and flows out gently towards the hem, creating an A-shaped silhouette. A flattering style for many body types.

name: Ladies Linen Skirt - Pink Printed
description: A skirt that wraps around the body and fastens at the waist with ties or a button. A comfortable and adjustable style that can be worn high or low on the waist.
